profile.profileName: [New School, New York, NY, USA] Kellen Design Archives
profile.profileDescription: This profile configures CollectiveAccess for use as an archive for images, documents, video and audio programs.

label.name_singular: Anna-Maria and Stephen Kellen Design Archives
label.name_plural: Anna-Maria and Stephen Kellen Design Archives

label.name_singular: Library of Congress Name Authority File
label.name_plural: Library of Congress Name Authority Files

label.name: Work type: Clippings and Tear sheets
Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Date
label.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the life cycle of the resource.

label.name: Alternate Identifiers
label.description: Any additional unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

label.name: GeoNames
label.description: A Geographic lookup that takes search text, passes it to the GeoNames search service and provides a drop down with search results (ordered by score). Selected geoname is stored as both text (name, country, continent and ID) and the service URL identifier.

label.name: Library of Congress Names Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Topical Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Geographic Areas Authority
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Genre Form Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Genre Frm headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

settings.setting: Collection guide available in electronic format

label.name: Library of Congress Subject Headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Inscription Set
label.description: All marks or written words added to the object at the time of production or in its subsequent history, including signatures, dates, dedications, texts, and colophons, as well as marks, such as the stamps of silversmiths, publishers, or printers. The location of this text or symbol may be specified by the position subelement. If a translation of the text into the language of the catalog record is also provided, include in a repeated element with the text type of translation.

label.name: Measurements Set
label.description: The physical size, shape, scale, dimensions, or format of the Work or Image. Dimensions may include such measurements as volume, weight, area or running time.

label.name: Rights Set
label.description: Information about the copyright status and the rights holder for a work, collection, or image. The optional notes sub-element may include any justifications, conditions, or restraints on use, contact or licensing information, or other intellectual property statements as may be desired.

label.name: Source
label.description: refers to the local, print, or electronic source from which information is derived for a specific element (e.g. Grove Dictionary of Art).

label.name: Description Set
label.description: A free-text note about the Work, Collection, or Image, including comments, description, or interpretation, that gives additional information not recorded in other categories. For element-specific notes, use the optional notes subelement.

label.name: Dates Set
label.description: Date or range of dates associated with the creation, design, production, presentation, performance, construction, or alteration, etc. of the work or image. See CCO Chapter 4: Stylistic and Chronological Information for a more thorough discussion of dates.

label.name: Refid
label.description: refers to id numbers or codes coming from the local institution or resource named in the source attribute.
